entities.name: avada kedavra

entities.name: moody
entities.description: A wizard who is teaching Harry Potter, mentioned as using his wand to cast a spell.

entities.name: harry potter

entities.name: spider

relationships.description: Moody roars 'Avada Kedavra' as he raises his wand, indicating that he is casting the spell.
Harry feels a sudden thrill of foreboding when Moody raises his wand, indicating that Harry is afraid of what Moody might do.
